apiDoc.name: MediaUploadCarousel
apiDoc.description: A horizontal scrollable carousel for managing uploaded media files. Features upload previews, remove functionality, drag-and-drop reordering, progress indicators, and bindable uploads array. Uses MediaUpload builder with Carousel, Item, and Preview subcomponents. Perfect for image galleries, attachment lists, or multi-file upload interfaces.
